body: @danimo @dragotin : is it the server's fault?

... i think it's not server fault, but i can't say with certainty
i set php.ini with wide limits of max dimension of uploaded file (4096mb) and 600 second of time out
will be fixed with one of the next client releases as soon as big file chunking is implemented

@karlitschek hello, i have the same issue as described as above, i can see this was a few months ago, any idea when the new client will be released that supports big file chunking? @marcotorresendi  i assume you've not found a work around for the time being either? thank you for your time.
there is a beta sync client 1.3 out that supports that. please check the mailinglist.
@karlitschek my apologies i have only recently signed up for the mailing list, i will give that a try, thank you very much for your excellent response time and support, enjoy your day.
